Actions.Text: REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Relates to exempting income earned by persons under the age of 24 from certain workforce development programs from the determination of need for public assistance programs
Summary: Relates to exempting income earned by persons under the age of 24 from certain workforce development programs from the determination of need for public assistance programs.
LawCode: Amd ยง131-a, Soc Serv L (as proposed in S.6443 & A.6753-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to exempting income earned by persons under the age of twenty-four from certain workforce development programs from the determination of need for public assistance programs
